Package org.mythdroid.activities

Class Summary
FrontendList ListActivity, displays, and lets the user manage, a list of frontends
Guide Display a program guide
MDActivity Base class for activities that display frontend choosers and/or loading dialogs - same as MDListActivity
MDListActivity Base class for activities that display frontend choosers and/or loading dialogs - same as MDActivity
MythDroid MDListActivity for the main menu Holds a number of public static members used as 'globals'
Prefs PreferenceActivity - the 'Settings' page Built from res.xml.preferences
RecordingDetail MDActivity showing a Recording's details Allows user to stop, delete or play the recording
RecordingEdit Edit a recording rule
RecordingEditGroups Edit recording and storage groups for a recording rule
RecordingEditSched Edit scheduling options for a recording rule
Recordings MDListActivity shows list of Recordings
Status ListActivity lists other Status activities Houses static method to fetch the status XML
StatusBackend Activity displays backend status
StatusJobs ListActivity displays upcoming/recent jobs
StatusRecorders ListActivity displays status of recorders
StatusScheduled ListActivity displays scheduled recordings
VideoDetail MDActivity displays details of a Video Allows user to play the Video or view further details at TVDB
VideoPlayer MDActivity displays streamed Video
Videos MDActivity displays browsable list of Videos
